God bless them. But I saw brutal killings of my neighbours through the 
curtains of my windows. We spent 14 days in Gurudwara camps. I heard the 
name of my male family members and I saw they had a list in their hands. 
This movie refreshed all the memories. I couldn't stop my tears and I cried 
a lot. Everyone knows the truth but still we haven't got nay justice. My 
grandparents witnessed the riots of 1947. My parents and I witnessed the 
riots of 1984. I left India and as I didn't want my children to see the 
same brutal violence and injustice in their lives. Where are the political 
leaders of India? Where is the Supreme Court? When the justice will be 
served? ﻿
comments.author: Kanwaljeet Arora
